DataSource.Name: FW9ZAE7MH1Q7YPM
DataSource.SQL:
select TAC.DisplayName as [Account Name], TAC.AccountId as [Account ID], TPS.PortfolioId as [Portfolio ID], TPS.SlotBalance as [Wallet Balance], TPS.SlotCreditLimit as [Wallet Credit], TPS.AmountOnHold as [Wallet Hold Amount], TPS.ExpireDate as [Wallet Expiration Date], (Stuff( ( select ', ' + MediaCode from tbMedia M inner join tbMediaCode MC on MC.MediaId=M.MediaId where M.TicketMediaMatchId=TTM.TicketMediaMatchId FOR XML PATH('') ), 1, 1, '' ) ) as [Media Codes], (select min (LogFiscalDate) from tbPortfolioSlotLog TPSL where TPSl.PortfolioId = TTM.TicketMediaMatchId ) as [First Statement Date] from tbMembershipPoint MP inner join tbPortfolioSlot TPS on TPS.MembershipPointId=MP.MembershipPointId left join tbTicketMediaMatch TTM on TPS.PortfolioId = TTM.TicketMediaMatchId left join tbAccount TAC on TAC.AccountId = TTM.AccountId WHERE MP.MembershipPointCode = '#WALLET' and TPS.SlotBalance<>0 and TPS.ExpireDate >= :@DateFrom and TPS.ExpireDate <= :@DateTO
order by [First Statement Date]

RichDescItem.Description:
Wallet With Balance Report

Abstract

"Wallet With Balance" gnerates a report of the Balance Sheet of all the validated Wallet per account in a period of time at your choice. Wallet values are displayed in local currency.​​​​​​​

Generating the report

Parameter Input
While generating the report, input parameters menu presents an intuitive interface.
Built-in wizards will help you quickly and easily create at your choice profile for your site by

  • [From date – To Date] – Period to be analysed, easy-to-select.
    • Note: The dates if not specified are to be considered “Fiscal Date”
 
Output File Extension
Built-in wizards will help you easily and quickly generate at your choice reports in XLSX or CSV or PDF formats. Format selection is required before running the report.​​​​​​​
  • XLSX
    • Report generates an EXCEL (latest version) file
  • CSV
    • its generation requires:
      • Field delimiter: Separator to be put between fields. Usually a "comma". When null, default is taken from user configuration.
      • Quote character: Character used to surround fields
      • Include header line to tick the box. Default is YES.
  • PDF
    • Report generates a PDF (latest version) file

Header

Report parameters:
  • [Execution date/time] -Report Execution Time. Date and Hours format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation]
  • [From date – To Date] – Selected Period

Contents (by Columns)

The program produces easy-to-read reports that include text information.
  • [Account Name] - Account Username. Display format “Last Name, First Name”
  • [Account ID] – Account Username ID
  • [Portfolio ID] – Portfolio ID
  • [Wallet Balance] - Balance Value of Wallet, in local currency
  • [Wallet Credit] - Credit Value of Wallet, in local currency
  • [Wallet Hold Amount] - Total Amount on Hold Value of Wallet, in local currency
  • [Wallet Expiration Date] - Wallet Expiration Date, format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation]
  • [Media Codes] - Media Code
  • [First Statement Date] - First Wallet Statement Date. Date format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation]
